Description:
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or any relevant field. Master’s degree is a plus.
1 plus years of experience in a related field.
Willingness to work overtime.
Aptitude for programming and learning new technologies.
Proven experience in software solutions and lifecycle.
Proven knowledge of Java, Java SE, Java EE, Spring, Hibernate, Angular, JavaScript, and SQL (Oracle or SQL Server) in UNIX, and Windows operating system.
Strong knowledge in supply chain and development.
Strong leadership, team orientation, interpersonal, and communication skills.
Fluent in English.Job Details
